Create a new plist_t type #PLIST_DATE

```csharp
public static PlistHandle plist_new_date(int sec, int usec)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sec | the number of seconds since 01/01/2001 |
| usec | the number of microseconds |

## Return Value

the created item
